reference.title: Counting the number of words in a document

section.p: provides a facility for counting the number of words and markup tags in a document at any time. The result is shown in a window and can be saved in a file.
To count the number of words in all the documents of a folder, see .

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: At least one document must exist in the selected folder.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
At least one document from the Document List window
Count Words… from the Utilities menu
The Count Words window (see ) is displayed. windowsCount Words Count Words windowFigure shows Count Words window

section.title: Options and parameters

plentry.pd: This box contains the list of the documents you selected in the Document List window.

One of the following options can be selected at a time. Select: Original To count the number of words in the document before translation. Translation To count the number of words in the translated document. Translation memory match information See for an explanation. Duplicate words See for an explanation. Fuzzy matches by class See for an explanation.

In this block you define where you want the system to save the results: Screen The result of the word count is displayed on your screen. This option is selected automatically. File Select this option to also store the count results in a file. You can:
Accept the proposed file name.
Type a file name of your choice.
Click Select… to display the Select File window from where you can choose the file name without having to type it (for a detailed description, see ).
Select the format of the count result file. The supported formats are
ASCII (plain text)
HTML
XML

section.p: Click Count to begin counting words.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you selected Original and output to Screen, the result is displayed in the Word Count Results - Original window (see ) with the following columns for each original document: Documents The name of the document Untranslated The number of words Markup The number of markup tags Total The number of words and markup tags

If you selected Translation and output to Screen, the result is displayed in the Word Count Results - Translation window (see ) with the following columns for each translated document: Documents The name of the document. Translated The number of original words already translated. Note that copying a marked part of a proposal (see ) is counted as one character. Untranslated The number of original words not yet translated. Target words The number of translated words in the translated document. Markup The number of markup tags. Total The number of translated words and markup tags.

image.alt: Figure shows Word Count Results - Translation window

section.p: If you selected the File output option, the results are stored in the same format in the specified file.
To return to the previous window, close the respective Word Count Result window.
